reviewText: very helpful. I am satisfied with the product.
Great product - I use it with my freshman Algebra classes - silly but not childish. Covers the math concepts is easy simple terms.

I really disliked math in high school. It was a difficult subject to master. With this video, I can take it step by step. It is broken down for me to understand it. If I don't grasp it? Simple-I press rewind. Having the convenience of rewinding it until I grasp it. This DVD is a MUST for anyone having a hard time with algebra. I am more than pleased with my purchase.
